item.name: Average number of microseconds needed to answer a question
pdns.corrupt-packets
item.description: PDNS. Number of corrupt packets received

item.name: pdns.deferred-cache-inserts
item.description: PDNS. Number of cache inserts that were deferred because of maintenance

item.name: pdns.deferred-cache-lookup
item.description: PDNS. Number of cache lookups that were deferred because of maintenance

item.name: pdns.dnsupdate-answers
item.description: PDNS. Number of DNS update packets successfully answered

item.name: pdns.dnsupdate-changes
item.description: PDNS. Total number of changes to records from DNS update

item.name: pdns.dnsupdate-queries
item.description: PDNS. Number of DNS update packets received

item.name: pdns.dnsupdate-refused
item.description: PDNS. Number of DNS update packets that were refused

item.name: pdns.key-cache-size
item.description: PDNS. Number of entries in the key cache

item.name: pdns.latency
item.description: PDNS. Average number of microseconds a packet spends within PowerDNS

item.name: pdns.meta-cache-size
item.description: PDNS. Number of entries in the metadata cache

item.name: pdns.packetcache-hit
item.description: PDNS. Number of packets which were answered out of the cache

item.name: pdns.packetcache-miss
item.description: PDNS. Number of times a packet could not be answered out of the cache

item.name: pdns.packetcache-size
item.description: PDNS. Amount of packets in the packetcache

item.name: pdns.qsize-q
item.description: PDNS. Number of packets waiting for database attention

item.name: pdns.query-cache-hit
item.description: PDNS. Number of hits on the query cache

item.name: pdns.query-cache-miss
item.description: PDNS. Number of misses on the query cache

item.name: pdns.rd-queries
item.description: PDNS. Number of packets sent by clients requesting recursion (regardless of if we'll be providing them with recursion).

item.name: pdns.recursing-answers
item.description: PDNS. Number of packets we supplied an answer to after recursive processing

item.name: pdns.recursing-questions
item.description: PDNS. Number of queries sent to recursor per second

item.name: pdns.recursion-unanswered
item.description: PDNS. Number of packets we sent to our recursor, but did not get a timely answer

item.name: pdns.servfail-packets
item.description: PDNS. Amount of packets that could not be answered due to database problems

item.name: pdns.signature-cache-size
item.description: PDNS. Number of entries in the signature cache

item.name: pdns.sys-msec
item.description: PDNS. Number of CPU miliseconds sent in system time

item.name: pdns.tcp-answers
item.description: PDNS. Number of answers sent out over TCP per second

item.name: pdns.tcp-queries
item.description: PDNS. Number of TCP queries received per second

item.name: pdns.timedout-packets
item.description: PDNS. Amount of packets that were dropped because they had to wait too long internally

item.name: pdns.udp-answers
item.description: PDNS. Number of answers sent out over UDP per second

item.name: pdns.udp-do-queries
item.description: PDNS. Number of queries received with the DO (DNSSEC OK) bit set

item.name: pdns.udp-queries
item.description: PDNS. Number of UDP queries received per second

item.name: pdns.udp4-answers
item.description: PDNS. Number of answers sent out over UDPv4

item.name: pdns.udp4-queries
item.description: PDNS. Number of questions received over UDPv4

item.name: pdns.udp6-answers
item.description: PDNS. Number of answers sent out over UDPv6

item.name: pdns.udp6-queries
item.description: PDNS. Number of questions received over UDPv6

item.name: pdns.user-msec
item.description: PDNS.Number of milliseconds spend in CPU 'user' time

item.name: Number of questions waiting for database attention
Number of recursive answers sent out
Number of queries sent to recursor
Number of times a server-failed packet was sent out
Number of answers sent out over TCP
Number of packets which weren not answered within timeout set
Number of answers sent out over UDP
